entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
